$
Private Events
/$
$
We take pleasure in adding a bit of imagination and glamour to every special affair, allowing our guests to relax and leave the details to us. Our genuine and personal attention to every aspect of outstanding service and exquisite food will exceed your expectations! The Casa Marina’s majestic dining room and expansive beachfront courtyard provide a distinctive setting for an unforgettable meeting or event.
/$
